name: Me, myself, and eye
description:
Me, myself, and eye is a short, one scene VN made for O2A2 2022!

Content warnings:

  • mild body horror
  • general themes of mental health issues and poor self worth? i wouldn't know what to say specifically

I had a week, fell into a minor depressive episode, and ended up cranking this baby out in the last 24 hours of the jam. I was originally going to do something completely different, but it kind of turned into a weird vent piece? I dunno!

there are two total endings. This is the first time I've ever really completed a writing project, and only the second time I've ever used renpy! I may update the game later to replace the missing assets and tweak the writing a bit, but the original will likely remain the only version playable on web.

click here to see the jam! vvvvvvvvvvvv




uhh if you liked the general vibes of the game please check out Nikita Kryukov's two games "Milk inside a bag of Milk inside a bag of Milk" and "Milk outside a bag of Milk outside a bag of Milk" as well as "This Book is a Dungeon" by Nathan Meunier. they're both totally worth the money and two huge artistic inspirations for me.
